short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide the LinkedIn feed to reduce distractions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide the distracting (and maddening?) LinkedIn feed with a reminder as to what you're actually supposed to be doing. No more WorkTok rabbit holes - get back to taking care of business. Customize a message to yourself and a link to something more productive to be doing with your day.

Leaders: have your staff install it to save them from wasting time on distracting BS in the LinkedIn feed.
